DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine efficacy and safety of 3% minoxidil lotion for beard enhancement.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of 3% Minoxidil Lotion for Beard Enhancement
DOC.criteria: Healthy male serious underlying diseases. history of beard/ hair treatment before 6 months history of surgery or trauma on beard area. history of minoxidil allergy
